file.name: triggers.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
components:
  schemas:
    Trigger:
      type: object
      properties:
        triggerType:
          type: string
          enum: ["http", "grpc"]
        triggerSettings:
          type: object
          properties:
            http:
              $ref: "./http.yaml#/components/schemas/HTTPRequest"
            grpc:
              $ref: "./grpc.yaml#/components/schemas/GRPCRequest"

    TriggerResult:
      type: object
      properties:
        triggerType:
          type: string
          enum: ["http", "grpc"]
        triggerResult:
          type: object
          properties:
            http:
              $ref: "./http.yaml#/components/schemas/HTTPResponse"
            grpc:
              $ref: "./grpc.yaml#/components/schemas/GRPCResponse"
